snippet.title: Guardians of Arcadia - Episode 1 Teaser (Steam)
snippet.description:
First official teaser trailer of Guardians of Arcadia - Episode 1.

Coming this year on Steam.
http://store.steampowered.com/app/456140/

We are proudly annoucing Guardians of Arcadia®, a indie JRPG made from fans to fans. Our goal is to provide a nostalgic feel on a genre that gently but slowly is getting more attention, mainly due to indie game developers like ourselves.


♪ Kevin MacLeod - Furious Freak
